716220.name: Strata Spaces VR
716220.description:
Strata Spaces VR is the ultimate application for modelers and designers to visualize their creations in an immersive, virtual environment.

Choose from several different spaces to fill with your creations. Using Strata's innovative COLLADA importer, bring in any models you want to view, stage, and manipulate in VR. Present singular models in a number of different contexts, or import massive designs and collections to arrange around yourself.

Change your lighting, control objects remotely, and duplicate or freeze your models with an intuitive and accessible menu system, designed to adapt to your specific needs.

Save your presentations and arrangements to revisit later, or share with other users.

This is the ideal companion tool for your design workflow. As part of the entire Strata 3D design tool set, Spaces VR lets you get into your design work like never before.

Upgrade to Spaces VR Professional for even more amazing features:
- Build your own custom corners with the Space Workshop!
- Export your arrangements as 360-degree 3D panoramas to share with Google Cardboard and other VR-enabled smartphones.
- Access several additional unique and immersive spaces, such as the full-sized Warehouse, Retail Space, Urban Street Corner, and more!
